蛪字的基本解释

蛪
qiè
〔蛪??（
z峮g ）〕古书上说的一种虫，似蝉。

蛪
ní
古同“霓”，虹的一种。

蛪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ní］
［《集韻》倪結切，入屑，疑。］
同“蜺1”。
霓。

蛪字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蛪； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1082第29
【唐韻】苦結切【集韻】詰結切，?音挈。蛪蠅，蟲。　又吉屑切，音結。【玉篇】蛪蚼，似蟬而小。　又【正韻】魚列切，音臬。【類篇】與蜺同。【史記·天官書】其蛪者類闕旗。　【集韻】或作?。

蛪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蛪字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Chrysanthemum
qiè
〔蛪?? (
z 峮 g )] a kind of insect in ancient books, like a cicada.
Chrysanthemum
ní
In ancient times, "Neon", a kind of rainbow.
Chrysanthemum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ní]
["Ji Yun" Ni Jieqie, into the crumbs, doubt. ]
Same as "Neon 1".
Neon.
Chrysanthemum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蛪; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1082 Page 29
[Tang Yun] Bitter knot cutting [Ji Yun] Cross-cut knot cutting,? Yinshu. Larvae, worms.　A good shavings are cut again, and the sound is knotted. 【Jade articles】The worms are like cicadas but small.　 [Zheng Yun] The fish line is cut, and the sound is stunned. 【Classes】Same as Ni. 【Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials】The flag of the phobia.　【Jiyun】or make?.
